data.name: Sherberia
data.detailed_description:
With your mother gone and your father falling ill, it is up to you to cure your dad and to save the family farm. Can you tackle the every day responsibilities of running a farm? Can you save your father?

Clean up your farm and start by sewing your first seed. Progress your farm by cleaning it up, working the land and bringing it into the future. Manual labor is slow but with the advances in technology creeping their way into Sherberia, you will find yourself automating your farm for maximum output.

Features
  • Farming. Your farm is your life. Strategically build it for efficiency and safety. Animals will destroy your fences, the sun will dry up your crops, deer will eat your crops. Your crops can have randomized traits that can be extracted and added to other plants!
  • Skills. Every node you mine, every tree you cut, every crop you sew and harvest all gain you experience! The more skillful you become, the more you will be able to do!
  • Townsfolk. Sherberia is full of interesting townsfolk. Spend some time getting to know them. Maybe they'll give you an item, advice or choose to shop at your store over a competitors!
  • Competition. Its not as simple as just selling your goods. You have to out-sell your competitors! Set your prices, curse your competition and make good relationships with the locals to ensure your old produce stand thrives!
  • Exploration. Explore and battle with enemies in a randomly generated cave system. The rarest of items exist within these depths and its up to you to explore and find items that will enrich your farm!
  • Combat! Roll and attack your way to victory. In Sherberia, enemies will power up attacks and unleash them at you. Use your ability to roll out of the way to out maneuver your enemies!
  • Enchantment. High quality items are key in everything you do in Sherberia. Better armor will save you from the depths. Better tools will allow you to manipulate the landscape quickly and effectively. In Sherberia, there is no ceiling! You can infinitely enchant your items!
  • Decoration. Use tiles, decorations and lights to make your farm truly yours. A unique farm for a unique farmer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6970 / Geforce GTX 560 TI
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz i5 Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7870 / Geforce GTX 580
